amendment.description: Amendment makes it a two year requirement for the President to report total U.S. cash and in-kind contributions to the entire United Nations system each fiscal year by every U.S. agency or department.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 26 printed in Part C of House Report 111-143 to make it a two year requirement for the President to report total U.S. cash and in-kind contributions to the entire United Nations system each fiscal year by every U.S. agency or department.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Poe (TX).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
